activities: PepsiCo Processes EEA/Swiss Personal Data (i) for human resources purposes, including to carry out PepsiCo's obligations under employment and benefits laws, to administer PepsiCo's benefits, compensation and human resources plans and programs, for recruiting, hiring, promotions and performance management, and for compliance and discipline reporting and investigation and (ii) in connection with our hosting and administration of email and other information technology resources.

personaldata: Human Resources Data, via manual and computerized processing
recoursemech: PepsiCo, Inc. agrees to cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
